record.id: field.name="km.smlogin" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: km.smlogin
record.file.name: environment

brief.brief: The user login name that has delete rights to the kmknowledgebaseupdates table and add/delete rights to the kmknowbaseerrors table. An OOB example is falcon.

Via a web service, the search engine calls back to Service Manager to indicate which documents have been updated or deleted or have caused error conditions in the search engine index. The Srvice Manager host and port, this user login name, and the user login password are all required for recoverability in the search engine indexing.
